I enjoyed playing this game very much. Managed to complete it within 12 hours with my boyfriend over two days and to be fair I wish there would be more chapters for co-op game play. The game is so much fun! I love the characters and the story.

Esse jogo não precisa de apresentação, um clássico com personagens icônicos e com níveis muito bem pensados. Os puzzles não são extremamente desafiadores, mas tem uma progressão lógica e te fazem pensar de uma forma diferente. O multiplayer é inovador e adiciona praticamente um outro jogo. As mecânicas novas não são tão bem aproveitadas, mas dão uma certa variedade ao jogo.
A história é sustentada totalmente pelos personagens, que possuem personalidades incríveis e, mesmo só havendo 3 deles (e uma sendo muda), conseguem entregar uma história engraçada e engajante.
Infelizmente o game é curto, durando pouco mais de 4 horas pra zerar (se bem que eu já zerei uma vez no xbox, então pode durar um pouco mais em uma primeira jogatina).
No mais, um jogo extremamente bem feito, assim como o original, expandindo seus conceitos para um outro nível. Vale a pena com certeza.

really fun and lots of witty comments... only complaint is how long it is. It's 3-4x longer in content than the first Portal game. It's not a bad thing but the constant "your finish!... oh wait... there's more" becomes a little irritating

This is one of the best games I have played! It really puts your mind to the test and is full of surprises! if you haven't played the first portal you should even though I personally think the second one is the best you have to go in order! this game is great for kids 10 +(it might be hard for younger kids to understand some puzzles) and really gets their minds working . It is really good at helping them problem solve! Don't even get me started with the storyline!! its absolutly incredible!! I will always be a fan and i wish they would make a third one! the mods and other fan based games are good too. (portal stories mel, apature tag, ect.) I hope you consider to buy this wonderful game and I really hope you enjoy it!

Ogólna ocena: 8.3 / 10 [na dzień 24-09-2020]

Druga część gry Portal w swej mechanice nie różni się zbytnio od poprzedniczki, choć dodano nieco elementów do urozmaicenia rozgrywki. 

Graficznie i dźwiękowo jest dość podobnie jak w jedynce, choć tym razem teren jest nieco bardziej urozmaicony. Ponownie mamy też nieco humorystycznych wstawek, zaś sama kampania jest ciekawsza, a do tego znacznie dłuższa, niż ta w jedynce (mniej więcej dwukrotnie). Do tego mamy też dużo map do gry w trybie kooperacji. 

Podobnie jak w przypadku jedynki – gra pozwala na sprawdzenie naszej kreatywności i spostrzegawczości, będąc jednocześnie bardzo prostą w obsłudze. Tym razem mam już względnie przyzwoitą długość rozgrywki, nawet jeśli jesteśmy sami i nie mamy z kim grać. Klasyczek, który z czystym sumieniem można polecić każdemu.
It's fun to play whit firends

Достойное продолжение первой части. Были добавлены новые фичи в уровнях, по типу гравитационных труб, которые несут тебя в одну сторону. Не спешите удалять игру после прохождения сюжетки. Этой игре пролили жизнь редактор и соответственно волшебная вкладочка "Уровни от сообщества". Скорее всего они там какую-то проверку проходят, потому что уровни там нормальные, где думать нужно не меньше, чем в уровнях от валве.

The original Portal benefited from its brevity. It had a concise story paired with inventive first-person puzzle mechanics that challenged you to be creative while pulling the trigger. Portal 2 makes the original look like the prototype it was. It's filled with a larger cast of characters vividly brought to life through brilliant writing and some of the best voice acting in video games. Its puzzles are challenging without being unreasonable, and, once you're finished with the single-player mode, one of the best co-operative experiences on the market awaits.
